attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the general public, think brine is possibly the most nutritious, vitalicious, delicioussy and bees-at-the-kneesy drink in the entire world. 

First created by Georgia Ecclestein-Bob, brine has only gained in popularity. Brine does not only get you inebriated for under £3, also there is no age limit (so under 18s can enjoy) and acts as the most stimulating afro-disiac known to this world, but mainly Salford (like, all of it). Basically, we ask you, our mate, Gordon Brown, to help us out mate. FFS (Freedom for Snowmen). *sorry about that* We want you to replace the selling of beer with that of the incredible substance....


BRINE. 

God bless and good night!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
